program.title: Financial Literacy & Economic Mobility
program.description: Building a foundation for financial independence and economic mobility through targeted financial literacy education and resources.
program.detailedDescription: This program builds the foundation for generational wealth, financial independence, and long-term stability. We deliver accessible, practical, and culturally aware financial education.
services: Budgeting, credit, and debt management skills
Workshops on small business financing and grant access
Coaching to navigate major financial decisions
program.impactStatement: Financial empowerment is central to our mission of self-determination for families and communities.
